text: (nabiyē!) oba mesē pavasanu: “minisunē! niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyangē sannidhānayenma mema satya dharmaya oba veta pæmiṇa ættēya. kavurun (meya anugamanaya kara), ṛju mārgayehima gaman karannēda ohu, tamangē yahapata san̆dahāma (ema) ṛju mārgayehi yannēya. kavurun (meya anugamanaya nokara) mārgaya værada yannēda, ohu, niyata vaśayenma tamanṭa napuru mārgayehima yannēya. tavada mā obava (bala kara) paripālanaya kirīmē balaya læbū keneku nova
